1318:3: sarvajñeyapraveśāya ca sarvajñeyānupraviṣṭaśca yo dharmāṇāṃ pravicayaḥ pañcavidyāsthānānyālambya pravartate adhyātmavidyāṃ hetuvidyāṃ śabdavidyāñcikitsāvidyāṃ śilpakarmasthānavidyāñca|
1318:10: pañcasu ca yathānirdiṣṭeṣu vidyāsthāneṣu triṣu ca rāśiṣu kauśalyakriyāyai sattvārthakriyāyai ca|
1318:11: yā bodhisattvānāmanabhilāpyaṃ dharmanairātmyamārabhya satyāvabodhāya vā satyāvabodhakāle vā satyābhisaṃbodhādvā urddhaṃ prajñā paramapraśamapratyupasthānā nirvikalpā sarvaṃprapañcāgatā sarvaṃdharmeṣu samatānugatā mahāsāmānyalakṣaṇapraviṣṭā jñeyaparyantagatā samāropāpavādāntadvaya vivarjitatvānmadhyamapratipadanusāriṇī|
1318:13: pañcasu vidyāsthāneṣu kauśalyaṃ vistareṇa pūrvavadveditavyaṃ tadyathā balagotrapaṭale|
1318:17: ityeteṣvaṣṭāsu sthāneṣu prajñāyāḥ kauśalyaparigraho mahāntaṃ niruttaraṃ jñānasambhāraṃ paripūrayatyanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye|
1318:19: teṣveva sthāneṣu yā prajñā sā sattvārthakriyāyai prajñā veditavyā|
1318:21: sā trividhā draṣṭavyā gambhīrasya dharmanairātmyajñānāya duṣkarā|
1318:26: śrāvakapiṭakaṃ bodhisattvapiṭakaṃ cārabhya śrutamayī prajñā cintāmayī prajñā|
1318:31: saddharmaśravaṇasamudāgatā pratyātmaṃ yoniśo manaskārasahagatā svaparārthaniścitā prajñā kleśavijahanā ca prajñā|
1318:39: sā ṣaḍvidhā saptavidhā caikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya trayodaśavidhā veditavyā|
1318:43: saptavidhā punaḥ dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānamabhijñājñānaṃ lakṣaṇajñānaṃ daśabalapūrvaṅgamaṃ jñānaṃ catasṛṣu ca yuktiṣu yuktijñānam|
1318:53: rājanītilaukikavyavahāranītiṣu ca bodhisattvasya yā niścitā prajñā|
1318:57: hetuvidyāyāṃ śabdavidyāyāṃ cikitsāvidyāyāṃ laukikaśilpakarmasthānavidyāyāṃ suvyavadātā no tu pratiṣṭhitā prajñā|
1318:58: tāmeva ca suvyavadātāṃ pañcaprakārāṃ vidyāṃ niśritya yā bodhisattvasya pareṣāṃ vineyānāṃ mūḍhānāṃ pramattānāṃ saṃlīnānāṃ samyak pratipannānāṃ yathākramaṃ saṃdarśanī samādāpanī samuttejanī saṃpraharṣaṇī ca prajñā|
1318:61: tattvārthe dvividhā yāvadbhāvikatayā yathāvadbhāvikatayā ca tattvārthasya grahaṇāt|
1318:65: itīyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ paścākārā daśaprabhedā prajñā viśuddhā paramayā viśuddhyā veditavyā|
1318:66: itīyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ su-viniścitā cāprameyā ca prajñā mahābodhiphalā yāmāśritya bodhisattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisaṃbudhyante|
1318:67: sa khalveṣa ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ teṣu-teṣu sūtrāntareṣu bhagavatā vyagrāṇāṃ nirdiṣṭānāmayaṃ samāsa-saṃgraha-nirdeśo veditavyaḥ|
1318:68: yasmiṃtathāgata-bhāṣite sūtre dānapāramitā vā yāvat prajñāpāramitā vā uddeśamāgacchati nirdeśaṃ vā sā svabhāva-dāne vā yāvat viśuddhe vā dāne'vatārayitavyā|
1318:70: evamanyeṣāṃ śīlādīnāṃ prajñāvasānānāṃ yathānirdiṣṭānāmavatāraḥ saṃgrahaśca yathāyogaṃ veditavyaḥ|
1318:71: yāni ca tathāgatānāṃ bodhisattvacaryā-janmāprameyāṇi jātakāni duṣkaracaryā-pratisaṃyuktāni tāni sarvāṇi dānapratisaṃyuktāni dānamārabhya veditavyāni|
1318:72: yathā dānamevaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ sarvāṇiṃ prajñāpratisaṃyuktāni prajñāmārabhya veditavyāni|
1318:73: kāniciddānamevārabhya kānicidyāvat prajñāmevārabhya kāniciddvayasaṃsṛṣṭāni kānicitrayasaṃsṛṣṭāni kāniciccatuḥsaṃsṛṣṭāni kānicitpañcasaṃsṛṣṭāni kānicitsarvā eva ṣaṭpāramitā ārabhya veditavyāni|
1318:74: ābhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiranuttarāyai samyak saṃbodhaye samudāgacchanto bodhisattvā mahāśukladharmārṇavā mahāśukladharmasamudrā ityucyante|
1318:76: asya punareṣāmevamapramāṇasya puṇyajñānasaṃbhārasamudāgamasya nānyatphalamevamanurūpaṃ yathānuttaraivaṃ samyaksaṃbodhiriti|
